context: where can I get just the 3 in 1 cable?  One of mine broke, the micro cable came out of the USB end
response: Same thing happened to my sons cable. He loves the charger and many are asking where we got it.

context: In order for the foot pedals to work, do you have to play a race car game online?
response: You don't have to play online, the pedals work regardless of your online connectivity.

context: does this game include war of chifes and asian dynasties?
Does this works with xbox one too?
Does this game is the digital, or fisical issue?
response: Both, it has an autetication (digital) and a box with a lot of stuff (fisical).

context: Hello! I bought the BF4 disc about two months ago from amazon and it works great, now I want to buy the premium also, is it going to work fine?
response: Yes it will! Premium is just an addition to the game with more maps, guns etc etc. Though it will take some time to down load depending on your internet!

context: Do I need to download the sims 3 and this one or does sims seasons come with sims 3 too
response: No you still need Sims 3 or you can't use this

context: How long is the cable between the Q1 and 360 please?
response: About 60"+ inches. If that isn't long enough for you, as was the case for me, you can just get an extension cable. I got a 6' extension cable for less than $4 from Monoprice. Now I can comfortably play from my sofa.

context: My Windows says it's Windows 7 Ultimate. Will it play well on my computer?
response: The games work just fine on my computer which has Windows 7.

context: will this charge with the ps3 turned off?

response: To Kilimandjaro:  The CH Products Flightstic, Pro USB, does not have the 'force feedback' feature.  Ron K

context: In order for the foot pedals to work, do you have to play a race car game online?
response: No. They just need to be plugged in and your game set to steering wheel controls. The instructions are also very good at exposing for to set buttons

context: I don't want Steam on my computer.  Does Civilization IV require Steam and/or an internet connection to play single-player game?
response: No. You don't have to have steam or internet.

context: Is this the ps vita or ps vita slim? Just making sure!:)
Whats a good cheap usb sound card to use with this?
response: I don't know how cheap you want to go, and how small/mobile of a device you're looking for, but take a look at these options: B0036VO4XO, B0044DEDCA, B0044DEDC0, B000WJ9K4G. Those are of course the ASINs, just paste those in the Amazon search box.

context: Is this Thrustmaster compatible with PS2?
response: you'll have to go to the manufacturers website, Guillemot(sp?). I have the T-Flight X joystick and it has a switch for playstation. There may be info on the box if you can get a large enough view to read..
